title: Crew Interview Release!
text: We have finally released the long awaited sketch 'Crew Interview'. You can watch it on YouTube!

title: Casting of Nico Garcia
text: We are looking to cast a male aged 18-30 for the main role in an upcoming short film, ideally from the Prešov area. The audition will be on May 16th at Čukoláda.

title: Last Shooting of 'Škatuľka kriedy'
text: We wrapped filming on our short film, 'Škatuľka kriedy', this past Saturday! Now it's on to post-production, and we're aiming for a September 2025 release.
